title: New VO for Miss Fortune with this new skin?
body: Just wondering with this new skin coming out will Miss Fortune finally get a new VO? I know shes already getting updated splash arts, just saying would be nice. {{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}

replies.body:
No, it's a 1350.  Ahri is the legendary so she gets the new voice over.

IF you mean her Base, then we dunno yet.
Mmm... when are Mf's new splash arts coming back from war
Here's hoping a friendly Rioter hears our call for updated MF voice work

Hey MisInsaneFortune, 

This particular skin won't have new VO. Currently, only legendary and ultimate skins will receive new VO.
Sadly Ahri got the legendary SSG skin and not MF {{sticker:zombie-nunu-tears}}
Wait when did they say it's legendary?

It just got posted in Surrender@20. Also like to say Ahri's interactions with Miss Fortune are unique. As in Ahri is the first to call Miss Fortune's first name Sarah while all the other champion interactions calls her Fortune.
Most likely not giving it not a legendary skin
